item.content:encoded:
Echeverria addresses whether neo-Calvinists such as Kuyper, Bavinck, and Dooyeweerd were correct in their criticism of an alleged two-story (i.e., dualistic) “textbook” view of the duplex ordo cognoscendi or the relation between nature and grace in Roman Catholic thought.

Listeners interested in this wide-ranging topic should note that Echeverria further develops his criticism of neo-Calvinism’s view of the duplex ordo in Roman Catholic thought in Berkouwer and Catholicism (Brill, 2013).
